prompts.prompt:
Create a new Agent2Agent agent with name **{agentName}**, URL **{agentUrl}**, model **{agentModel}**, and description:

> {description}

arguments.name: agentName
arguments.description: The name of the new agent.

arguments.name: agentUrl
arguments.description: The server-relative URL of the new agent.

arguments.name: agentModel
arguments.description: The AI model the agent should use.

template.name: a2a-editor-add-extension
template.title: Add an extension to an agent
template.description: Adds an extension to an existing agent.

template.name: a2a-editor-create-skill
template.title: Create a new skill for an agent
template.description: Creates a new skill for a given agent.

arguments.name: agentName
arguments.description: The agent to attach the skill to.

prompts.prompt:
For agent **{agentName}** and skill **{skillId}**, create a new tag: **{tagName}**.

Confirm and return the updated tag list.

template.name: a2a-editor-create-tag
template.title: Add a new tag to a skill
template.description: Adds a new tag to a specific skill of an agent.

arguments.name: agentName
arguments.description: The agent that owns the skill.

arguments.name: skillId
arguments.description: The skill ID where the tag will be added.

arguments.name: tagName
arguments.description: The name of the new tag.

template.name: a2a-editor-set-app-registration
template.title: Set app registration for an agent
template.description: Sets Entra ID app registration details for an agent.
